sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from './sidebar'; class KundaliMatching extends Component { render() { let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/' let imagealt = 'image' return (

  • 28 March 2025

Stars In Astrology

üíë Kundali Matching (‡Æú‡Ææ‡Æ§‡Æï ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡Øç)

An essential part of Vedic astrology, especially in marriage matching (‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Æ£ ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡Øç) in Indian and Tamil traditions.

üîç Kundali Matching in Vedic Astrology

Analyzes compatibility between two people ‚Äî mainly for marriage ‚Äî based on their birth stars (Nakshatras), Moon signs, planetary positions, and other factors.

üïäÔ∏è Why Kundali Matching is Important?

  • ‚úÖ Ensures emotional, physical & spiritual compatibility
  • ‚úÖ Predicts harmony, love, longevity of marriage
  • ‚úÖ Checks doshas like Mangal Dosh, Nadi Dosh, Dasa Sandhi
  • ‚úÖ Determines strength of family life, progeny, finances, and peace

üåü The 10 Poruthams (‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æô‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ≥‡Øç)

Traditional Tamil method considers 10 types of compatibility matches.

No. Porutham Name Tamil Name Meaning
1Ô∏è‚É£Dina Porutham‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ© ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçHealth, daily happiness
2Ô∏è‚É£Gana Porutham‡Æï‡Æ£ ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçNature, character match
3Ô∏è‚É£Mahendra Porutham‡ÆÆ‡Æπ‡Øá‡Æ®‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ∞ ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçFamily growth, children
4Ô∏è‚É£Sthree Dheerga Porutham‡Æ∏‡Øç‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ∞‡ØÄ ‡Æ§‡ØÄ‡Æ∞‡Øç‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçWoman's welfare, longevity
5Ô∏è‚É£Yoni Porutham‡ÆØ‡Øã‡Æ©‡Æø ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçPhysical compatibility
6Ô∏è‚É£Rasi Porutham‡Æ∞‡Ææ‡Æö‡Æø ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçZodiac sign match
7Ô∏è‚É£Rasi Adhipathi Porutham‡Æ∞‡Ææ‡Æö‡Æø ‡ÆÖ‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ™‡Æ§‡Æø ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçPlanetary lord match
8Ô∏è‚É£Vasya Porutham‡Æµ‡Ææ‡Æö‡Øç‡ÆØ ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçMutual attraction
9Ô∏è‚É£Rajju Porutham‡Æ∞‡Æú‡Øç‡Æú‡ØÅ ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçLongevity of marriage
üîüVedha Porutham‡Æµ‡Øá‡Æ§ ‡Æ™‡Øä‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡ØçAvoids inauspicious pairing

‚úÖ Minimum 6‚Äì7 Poruthams are acceptable.

‚ö†Ô∏è Rajju, Nadi, and Dina are most crucial!

ü™ê Advanced Matching ‚Äì Planetary Charts

Aspect What‚Äôs Checked
Rashi & NakshatraMoon sign and star compatibility
Dasha BalanceMajor life phase alignment
Manglik DoshaPosition of Mars in both charts
Nadi DoshaBody/energy type ‚Äî duplication not advised
Bhava MatchingHouse placements across charts
Navamsa Chart (D9)Deeper marital compatibility
Kundali Gun MilanNorth Indian 36-point Guna system
üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Spiritual Note: ‚ÄúKundali matching is a guidance tool, not a final judgment. True love, understanding, and mutual growth are above stars.‚Äù
) } } export default KundaliMatching;
